name: E.T. GAME
description:
You play as a teenager. You can imagine tissues all over the floor cause I didn't have the time to put some tissues all over the floor.

"I remember being a teenager. I used to go to a game store and pick any game just because of its cover. I usually didn't know the game at all but was still gonna pay for it. Sometime, I was already disappointed without even playing it, just by looking a bit closer on my way to home."

Made for WeeklyHourGameJam.

Theme: "Extraterrestrial forms of game"

Probably took 10 extra minute if you count playtesting and technical problems

[EDIT: spent another 5 minute to add a secret ending.]
